support.title: Show your support
support.descp: Help make this book a reality by contributing $5. You'll have our heartfelt thanks.

support.title: Get the ebook
support.descp: Get the ebook. The digital version of the hardcover.

support.title: Get the Book
support.descp: Backers will receive a copy of the book at this level. They'll also get an acknowledgement in the back of the book.

support.title: Get a Signed Book
support.descp: Backers will receive a signed copy of the book at this level, and an acknowledgement in the back of the book.

support.title: Get the Book and Add UnPresidented
support.descp: This is a chance to get signed copies of the Eclipse book AND one of the few remaining, first edition copies of UnPresidented, our photo book documenting the Trump inauguration protests and Women's March. UnPresidented is out of print and is an instant collector's item. Backers will also receive an acknowledgement in the back of Chasing the Great American Eclipse.

support.title: Two Books
support.descp:
Backers at this level will receive two copies of the book and an acknowledgement in the back of the book.
One for you and one as a gift!

support.title: Get a Signed Book and 8 x 10 Art Print
support.descp: A limited number of backers will receive a signed copy of the book and an 8 x 10 art print at this level and an acknowledgement in the back of the book.

support.title: Signed Book and 16 x 20 Art Print
support.descp:
A limited number of backers will receive a signed copy of the book and a 16 x 20 art print of an image from the book at this level and an acknowledgement in the back of the book.
Print will be on high-quality matte paper.

support.title: Total Eclipse Package
support.descp:
A limited number of backers will receive two signed copies of the book and a SIGNED and NUMBERED 16 x 20 art print of an image from the book at this level and a special acknowledgement at the front of the list of backers.
Print will be on high-quality matte paper.

support.title: Our Launch Special
support.descp: A limited number of backers will receive a copy of the hardcover book at this level for the first 24 hours of the campaign. They'll also get an acknowledgement in the back of the book.

support.title: Get the Book
support.descp: A limited number of backers will receive a copy of the book at this level. They'll also get an acknowledgement in the back of the book.

support.title: Our Best Deal
support.descp:
For the first 24 hours of the campaign, a limited number of backers will receive TWO signed copies of the book at this level, and an acknowledgement in the back of the book.
One for you and one as a gift!
